meanings.definition: Having the most prominent or sagging cheeks.
meanings.sent1: The bulldog had the jowliest cheeks in the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Grandma's face was the jowliest at the family reunion.
meanings.sent3: The jowliest cheeks on the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The jowliest cheeks on the clown made his smile even bigger.
meanings.sent5: The jowliest cheeks on the teddy bear made it look extra cuddly.

meanings.sent1: The old man smiled jowliest when he saw his grandchildren.
meanings.sent2: The dog barked jowliest when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: The comedian told jokes jowliest, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wind blew jowliest through the trees on the hill.
meanings.sent5: The chef stirred the soup jowliest, ensuring it was well mixed.
